header_text: You are meeting a new friend for lunch soon. You have recently been a bit messier when you eat, and you are worried they will judge you. When you begin to eat your food, you notice your new friend is looking at you strangely.

elements.text: You are meeting a new friend for lunch soon. You have recently been a bit messier when you eat, and you are worried they will judge you. When you begin to eat your food, you notice your new friend is looking at you strangely.
